subject: Re: more suggestions?
author: Fiona Broome
full_text:
Hi,

Though I'd been lurking briefly, and I always try to get a sense of groups' tones before introducing myself, I'm still very much a newbie here.

So, I'm sorry if I sound amazingly obtuse.  I don't always "hear" sarcasm in text, at least until I've been on a list longer and get a better idea of the more vocal personalities.

I understand some of the "hornet's nest" issues, at least from a ghost hunting perspective.  I generally avoid the poltergeist/ghost issue, though I have opinions as admittedly shaky as everyone else's.  (For me, the poltergeist:water connection is most interesting.) All in all, I try to keep an open mind.

That said... the recording with the woman's voice saying things including "Contact his box"... that's on the level?  If so, that's startling.  I heard some unexpected and clear voices on the box Chris Moon was using, but if that's real, this throws another large wrench/spanner in my mental works.  

I love it when compelling new (at least, new to me) data kicks my smug assumptions, hard.

Of course, if that wasn't posted as a real recording, I'm going back to lurk mode now, blushing scarlet.

Cheerfully,
Fiona
